A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After seeing The Force Awakens\, I left the theater with a grin from ear to ear saying that that was one of the best movies I had seen in my entire life!!!! I am 29 years old and that is the ONLY movie that I’ve ever seen twice in the theaters! I loved getting to know Rey\, Poe\, Bb8\, & Fin.... they nailed it . The Last Jedi was a plain disappointment. It didn’t feel genuine. It felt like the studios rushed and made a crappy movie because they could make more money. Why oh why was JJ Abrams not the director again?!? I did like it a bit more than Rogue I. I’ve never written a review on here\, but felt the need to after seeing this. Signed\, Disney messed up big time
